balls:Baal.NAME: Baal
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. All elites become burning elites.

balls:BallOfYarn.NAME: Ball of Yarn
DESCRIPTIONS: On receiving a fatal blow, this relic instead negates the damage. You may do this #b3 times.

balls:BallSack.NAME: Ball Sack
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, add 1 common, 1 uncommon, and 1 rare #pBalls relic. Obtain #rTesticular #Torsion

balls:Baseball.NAME: Baseball
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain strength at the start of combat. Whenever you deal the exact amount of damage required to kill an enemy, permanently increase this value by #b1.

balls:Basketball.NAME: Basketball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play cards of the same card type back-to-back, gain #b1 block.

balls:BeachBall.NAME: Beach Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 dexterity at the start of combat. Every turn, you must play a power, or lose that #b2 dexterity.

balls:BruceAvocadoLittleLeviathanSouleat.NAME: Bruce Avocado Little Leviathan Souleater
balls:BruceAvocadoLittleLeviathanSouleat.FLAVOR: An elite specimen of unparalleled power. His owner is stinky.
DESCRIPTIONS: On overkill, store excess damage done to enemy. Right-click to use. Reset the counter and gain block equal to the counter.

balls:BowlingBall.NAME: Bowling Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill every enemy on the same turn, at the start of next combat, your first attack deals double damage.

balls:CheeseBall.NAME: Cheese Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal for half of your max health. Whenever you heal HP, heal 2 extra HP.

balls:CricketBall.NAME: Cricket Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack you play at the start of battle costs 0 and does double damage.
Credit to #gBento #gBaker #gPraymordis for coming up with the effect for this relic.

balls:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: See a preview of the next combat when hovering over the nodes on the map.

balls:DiscoBall.NAME: Disco Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you choose to skip a card reward, you are able to navigate freely to the next floor.

balls:Dodgeball.NAME: Dodgeball
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat. Wears off on your second turn.

balls:DragonBall.NAME: Dragon Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]act.[] Right-click to make a wish.

balls:EightBall.NAME: Eight Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: See a preview of the next event when hovering over the nodes on the map.

balls:EnergyBall.NAME: Energy Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]act.[] Right-click to gain [E]

balls:Eyeball.NAME: Eyeball
balls:Eyeball.FLAVOR: Beauty is in the eye of the ball holder
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]act.[] Right-click to use. Choose a card in your draw pile, that card is played twice then exhausted.

balls:Football.NAME: Football
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You may only spend #b1 minute on any given turn.

balls:FudgeBall.NAME: Fudge Ball
balls:FudgeBall.FLAVOR: it's poopoo caca do not be deceived
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, regain all HP and gain #b20 max hp. Whenever you encounter another food relic, regain all your HP upon picking it up. Lee's Waffle grants #b15 max HP on pickup. Gain an extra #b1 max HP per floor. Negates the effects of Mark of the Bloom.

balls:GolfBall.NAME: Golf Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain gold at the end of combat based on how quickly you finish. Par is the act number. NL Hole In One: #b25 gold. NL Eagle: #b20 gold. NL Birdie: #b15 gold. NL Par: #b10 gold. NL Bogey: #b5 gold.

balls:Gumball.NAME: Gumball
balls:Gumball.FLAVOR: Your balls have some gumption to them
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b3 attacks played in a turn, gain #b1 health.

balls:Hairball.NAME: Hairball
DESCRIPTIONS: At that start of combat, there is a #b50% chance for a random enemy to become stunned. Every 3 times this happens, gain #b1 entangle.
Credit to #gpgames-food for coming up with the effect for this relic.

balls:Handball.NAME: Handball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack an enemy, deal #b2 additional damage to a random monster.

balls:Kickball.NAME: Kickball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy attacks you for less than #b8 damage, deal up to #b8 damage back to them.

balls:Marble.NAME: Marble
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]combat.[] Right-click to apply #b1 vulnerable to all enemies.

balls:MedicineBall.NAME: Medicine Ball
balls:MedicineBall.FLAVOR: Take two of these and call me in the morning
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you rest at a campfire, gain #b1 #yStrength. You can do this #b3 times. Whenever you lift with Girya, restore #b15% of your max HP.

balls:Mudball.NAME: Mudball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked, increase the counter by #b1. At the start of your turn, gain block equal to the counter. Whenever you attack an enemy, decrease the counter by #b1 and the enemy takes #b1 damage at the start of their next turn. Effect resets between combats.
Credit to #gpgames-food for coming up with the effect for this relic.

balls:PachinkoBall.NAME: Pachinko Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click for a #b50% chance to double the gold at a card reward, or the gold disappears.

balls:PaddleBall.NAME: Paddle Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: You take 0 damage from the firstj attack that hits you each combat and it reflects back onto the attacking enemy.

balls:Pinball.NAME: Pinball
balls:Pinball.FLAVOR: I want you to pin me, Flirt
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you alternate attacks between different enemies, increase the damage dealt by #b2.

balls:PingPongBall.NAME: Ping Pong Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you attack an enemy consecutively, increase the damage dealt by #b2.

balls:Pokeball.NAME: Pokeball
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of every combat, add #b30 gold, a potion, or a card reward to the rewards.

balls:RiceBall.NAME: Rice Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal for half of your missing health.

balls:RubberBandBall.NAME: Rubber Band Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]only [#2aecd7]once.[] Every turn, increase the counter by 1. Right-click to unleash it's fury, dealing #b5 times the counter as damage to all enemies.

balls:RubberBouncyBall.NAME: Rubber Bouncy Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]turn.[] Right-click to deal #b7 damage to a random enemy.

balls:SoccerBall.NAME: Soccer Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an extra card next turn for each remaining [E] this turn.

balls:Snowball.NAME: Snowball
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b3 attacks played, channel #b1 frost orb.

balls:TennisBall.NAME: Tennis Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]only [#2aecd7]once.[] At the start of your turn, increase the counter by #b1. Right-click to gain block equal to the counter.

balls:Volleyball.NAME: Volleyball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you alternate between playing attacks and skills, gain #b2 block.

balls:WaterPoloBall.NAME: Water Polo Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]combat.[] Right-click to enter Calm. If you are already in Calm, enter Wrath.

balls:WhiffleBall.NAME: WhiffleBall
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b4 cards you play, draw #b1 card and discard #b1 card.

balls:WreckingBall.NAME: Wrecking Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, deal between #b5 and #b10 damage to each enemy, ignoring block.
